description: Generates research questions from a research position, using rq_templates and logic_pattern provided by EpistemicRuleEngine.

research_position.description: The declarative research position from ResearchPositionBuilder.

rq_templates.description: Research question templates from EpistemicRuleEngine (2–3 items).

logic_pattern.description: The reasoning structure pattern from EpistemicRuleEngine (e.g. 'gap → hypothesis → method → evidence → solution').

dominant_orientation.description: The dominant epistemic orientation from EpistemicRuleEngine.

research_questions.description: Research questions generated from the provided templates.

template.description: The original rq_template this question was derived from.
